message: Fair split, let's start with a clean slate!
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I want to get a bigger piece of the pie!
You're being greedy, Bob! I'll give you a slightly better deal this time
I'm not being greedy, I'm just trying to get a fair deal. Meet me in the middle!
You're not being greedy, Bob, but I think I can do better than that
I'm starting to think you're not serious about splitting it fairly, Alice. I'll give you a slightly smaller share this time, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'm starting to get frustrated, Bob. I think we're getting nowhere. Let's meet in the middle again
I'm not going to back down. I think I deserve a bigger share, and I'm willing to take the risk of you rejecting it.
I'm not going to give in to your demands, Bob. Let's try to find a compromise
I'm not going to back down now. I'm taking what I think I deserve, and you can either accept it or we can keep negotiating.
I'm not going to let you bully me, Bob. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not giving in completely
I'm not going to back down now. I'm taking almost all of the money, and you're getting a tiny fraction. It's my last offer.
I've had enough of your games, Bob. I'm giving up. You can have it all.
